channel.title: Food Service Exchange | Restaurant Equipment & Supplies
channel.description: Food Service Exchange is a marketplace connecting food service operators with food service manufacturers and dealers, with benefits for all. Browse our selection of discounted restaurant equipment.

item.title: ABC Pro, 1/2 Size Steam Table Pan, Stainless Steel
item.description: ABC Pro, 1/2 Size Steam Table Pan, 7 Qrt. Capacity. Anti-jamming design. Stainless Steel. 24 Gauge. 18-8 Stainless Steel. Unite Size: 12.75 x 10.38 x 4"H
item.g:product_type: Brands

item.title: American Metalcraft, Set of 4 Slip Stop Sleeves - Black
item.description: Black plastic sleeves keep plates from slipping on stand or stand from sliding on table. The American Metalcraft 4SSS slip-stop sleeves fit onto a stand to prevent it from sliding on tabletops and keep plates from slipping on the stand. They fit on a variety of pizza stands, racks, and risers. Since they come in black, the sleeves blend into most settings and keep stains hidden. Size: 4 1/8" L
item.g:product_type: Brands

item.title: Continental Refrigerator DL1W-SA Heated Cabinet, Reach-In Designer Line Heated Cabinet 26.0(w) Stainless Steel
item.description: Designer Line Heated Cabinet, reach-in, one-section, 21 cu. ft. capacity, (3) shelves, stainless steel exterior, aluminum interior, standard depth cabinet, narrow full-height doors, electronic control with digital display, hi-low alarm, cETLus, NSF; Interior configuration:shelves; Exterior Finish:all stainless steel exterior; Doors:hinged solid; Depth:standard depth; Size:1 section; Interior Finish:aluminum interior
item.g:product_type: Eleven 36

item.title: Mercer Culinary M14804 Kitchen Shears
item.description:
The Mercer Cutlery Premium Kitchen Shears are versatile and durable kitchen shears made from high carbon Japanese steel. They have polypropylene handles and can be easily taken apart for cleaning. The shears feature serrated teeth for easy cutting and also have a built-in bottle opener, nutcracker, and lid lifter for added convenience. They are NSF-certified for quality and have an overall length of 8 7/8 inches. The handles are black, and the blades are made from high carbon steel.
Prop 65 Warning. This product contains a chemical known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.p65warnings.ca.gov
item.g:product_type: Eleven 36

item.title: Vulcan ARS48 48" Refrigerated Base With Marine Top And (2) Drawers
item.description: The Vulcan ARS48 48" Refrigerated Base With Marine Top And (2) Drawers features stainless steel construction, marine top, stainless base, galvanized back, heavy-duty casters, magnetic drawer gasket, and operates at 1/3 hp, 115v/60/1, 6.7 amps.
item.g:product_type: Eleven 36 > Refrigeration > Work Top and Undercounter Refrigeration

item.title: Vulcan ARS84 84" Refrigerated Base With Marine Top And (4) Drawers
item.description: The Vulcan ARS84 84" Refrigerated Base With Marine Top And (4) Drawers features a marine top and stainless steel base, front, top, sides, and interior. It includes four drawers, heavy-duty casters, and operates at 1/2 hp, 115v/60/1, 12.0 amps.
item.g:product_type: Eleven 36 > Refrigeration > Work Top and Undercounter Refrigeration

item.title: Vulcan ARS96 96" Refrigerated Base With Marine Top And (6) Drawers
item.description: The Vulcan ARS96 96" Refrigerated Base With Marine Top And (6) Drawers features a marine top and stainless steel base, front, top, sides, and interior. It includes six drawers, heavy-duty casters, and operates at 1/6 hp, 115v/60/1, 11.25 amps.
item.g:product_type: Eleven 36 > Refrigeration > Work Top and Undercounter Refrigeration

item.title: Vulcan ARS72 72" Refrigerated Base With Marine Top And (4) Drawers
item.description: This Vulcan refrigerated base features a marine edge top and four drawers, each capable of holding (2) 12" x 20" x 6" food pans. With stainless steel construction, anti-condensate perimeter drawer heaters, and controllable drawer closures, this unit provides efficient refrigerated storage while conserving energy.
item.g:product_type: Eleven 36 > Refrigeration > Work Top and Undercounter Refrigeration

item.title: Vulcan VSC36 36" Flat Top Stainless Steel Refrigerated Base With 2 Drawers
item.description: The Vulcan VSC36 36" Flat Top Stainless Steel Refrigerated Base With 2 Drawers is a refrigerated base with self-contained operation, (2) drawers, flat top, stainless steel front & sides, electric condensate evaporator, and casters. It is certified by cULus and NSF.
item.g:product_type: Eleven 36 > Refrigeration > Work Top and Undercounter Refrigeration

item.title: Vulcan MSA60 60" Msa Series Flat Top Gas Commercial Griddle
item.description: The Vulcan MSA60 60" MSA Series Flat Top Gas Griddle offers a 60" W x 24" D cooking surface with a 1" thick polished steel griddle plate and embedded mechanical snap action thermostat controls. It includes stainless steel construction, front grease trough, and operates at 135,000 BTU. It is certified by CSA Star, CSA Flame, and NSF. Prop 65 Warning. This product contains a chemical known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.p65warnings.ca.gov
item.g:product_type: Eleven 36 > Kitchen Equipment > Cooking Equipment > Commercial Grills and Griddles

item.title: Vulcan VGMT36S V Series Heavy Duty Stainless Steel 36" Gas Range With 3-30,000 BTU Burner T-Stat Griddle And Standard Oven
item.description:
A versatile gas range with a 36" griddle featuring snap action thermostatic controls and a standard oven. The unit's stainless steel construction, adjustable legs, and substantial 140,000 BTU output make it suitable for various cooking needs.

Prop 65 Warning. This product contains a chemical known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.p65warnings.ca.gov

item.title: Vulcan VGMT36C V Series Heavy Duty Stainless Steel 36" Gas Range With 3-30,000 BTU Burner T-Stat Griddle And Convection Oven
item.description:
The Vulcan VGMT36C V Series Heavy Duty Stainless Steel Gas Range features a 36" griddle with three 30,000 BTU burners, snap action thermostatic controls, and a convection oven. It includes stainless steel construction and adjustable legs, offering a total output of 122,000 BTU. Certified by CSA Flame, CSA Star, and NSF.

item.description:
The Vulcan VGMT36B is a V Series heavy-duty range featuring a 36" stainless steel gas griddle with 3X 30,000 BTU burners and snap action thermostatic controls. It includes a cabinet base, stainless steel front, sides, and base, and operates at 90,000 BTU. Certified by CSA Flame, CSA Star, and NSF.

item.title: Vulcan VCBB48 Modular V Series Heavy Duty Stainless Steel 36" Gas Range With 130,000 BTU 6-Burner Charbroiler
item.description: The Vulcan VCBB48 Modular Gas Range combines a 36" range with a 6-burner charbroiler boasting 130,000 BTU output. Its cast iron grates and char-radiants enhance cooking performance, while stainless steel construction ensures durability. Certified by CSA and NSF. Prop 65 Warning. item.title: Vulcan K60DL 60 Gallon Direct Steam Floor Mounted Stationary Kettle
item.description: The Vulcan K60DL is a 60-gallon KDL Series direct steam floor-mounted stationary kettle with a true working capacity. It features a 2/3 jacketed, 316 series stainless steel liner with an ellipsoidal bottom, spring-assisted hinged cover with heavy duty pivot assembly, and a 2" plug draw-off valve with perforated strainer. Certified by cULus, UL EPH, and ANSI/NSF 4.
